title: Patient Care Practical Skills Enhancement: Virtual Synchronous Continuing Professional Development for Rural University Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental practical knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants enhance practical competencies in social fields by at least three levels using a webinar platform.
Participants concretely propose methods to apply acquired knowledge to practical tasks through project-based assessments.
Participants acquire at least two effective online learning methods applicable in low-bandwidth environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
